work.title: Ved en ung Kunstners Baare
At the Bier of a Young Artist
Andante doloroso
Ved en ung kunstners båre
for strygeorkester
for String Orchestra

history.p: The short piece for string orchestra, Ved en ung Kunstners Baare, was composed following the death of the painter Oluf Hartmann. He had died on Sunday, 16 January 1910, and already by the following Wednesday Nielsen end-dated the pencil draft. The composition was premiered at Hartmann's funeral and also played at Nielsen's own funeral service at the Copenhagen Cathedral on 9 October 1931.

event.desc: Østerbro Kammermusikforening. Performed under the title "Andante Doloroso". First (?) performance for string orchestra.

event.corpName: Musicians from the Royal Danish Orchestra (Det Kongelige Kapel)
